abstract: The biggest of the proxy advisory firms wrote in a report that Illumina shareholders should re-elect all of the company’s proposed directors, instead of voting for director candidates proposed by Roche.
snippet: The biggest of the proxy advisory firms wrote in a report that Illumina shareholders should re-elect all of the company’s proposed directors, instead of voting for director candidates proposed by Roche.

headline.main: I.S.S. Sides With Illumina in Proxy Fight Against Roche

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
